graph_title: Alcohol consumption per capita (aged 15 years and older) within a calendar year (litres of pure alcohol)

target_name: 마약 및 해로운 알코올을 포함하여 약물남용 예방 및 치료 강화
page_content: ▶ Data type: National data (Type1) This is the national produced statistics in the ROK that best corresponds to the definition of UN SDGs indicators. Download the national metadata file for more information.
target: Strengthen the prevention and treatment of substance abuse, including narcotic drug abuse and harmful use of alcohol
title: Harmful use of alcohol, defined according to the national context as alcohol per capita consumption (aged 15 years and older) within a calendar year in litres of pure alcohol
